title: New project creation cannot handle tick mark in VS file path
body:
**Based on external customer feedback reported [here](https://vsfeedback/comment/796182)**

**Repro**: 
- Create new VB proj in VS 2017 Community. 
- Rename "Microsoft Visual Studio 15" folder to "Microsoft  Visual Studio '15". 
- Should fail with error `"An unexpected token was found at character position 37 in condition "Exists('D:\Microsoft Visual Studio '15\2017\Community\MSBuild\$(MSBuildToolsVersion)\Microsoft.Common.props')".`

nodes.body:
Team triage: closing due to age and lack of response.

Personal triage: this makes me very sad :(
